item.title: Nedd help!
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

We could if we knew what was wrongâ€¦

Try this:

[hr]
[php]

<?php session_start(); ?> SD Client - Hosted by the Scorched Devils The password function is new, and it will be changed once a week, please check the topic under SD Client News and Annoucments to find the new password. Password:

<?php 
	$_SESSION['valid'] = "no";
	require_once("password/config.php");

	//Do not change these!
	$postpass = $_POST['pass'];
	
	if ($postpass == $password)
	{
		$_SESSION['valid'] = "yes";
		echo "<meta HTTP-EQUIV=\"REFRESH\" content=\"0; url=http://www.sdclient.110mb.com/runescape.htm\">";
	}
	else if ($postpass == NULL)
	{
		$_SESSION['valid'] = "no";
		echo "Please insert a password!";
	}
	else if ($postpass != $password)
	{
		$_SESSION['valid'] = "no";
		echo "Invalid password!";
	}
	?>
</center>
[/php] [hr]

Read full topic

item.title: Nedd help!
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Hey can someone fix up this php for me ?

[code]

SD Client - Hosted by the Scorched Devils The password function is new, and it will be changed once a week, please check the topic under SD Client News and Annoucments to find the new password. Password:

<?php session_start(); $_SESSION['valid'] = "no"; require_once("password/config.php"); ?> <?php //Do not change these! $postpass = $_POST['pass']; elseif ($postpass == $password) { $_SESSION['valid'] = "yes"; echo ''; } elseif ($postpass == "") { $_SESSION['valid'] = "no"; } elseif ($postpass != $password) { $_SESSION['valid'] = "no"; echo "Invalid password!"; } ?> [/code]

Read full topic
